title: WTB: 1926 Toronto Maple Leafs Baseball Team postcard w/Hubbell
author: jb217676

posts.post_title: WTB: 1926 Toronto Maple Leafs Baseball Team postcard w/Hubbell
posts.post_content: Shot in the dark here, but I'm looking for a 1926 Toronto Maple Leafs Baseball Team postcard w/ Carl Hubbell (like the one in the picture below). Give me a shout if you can help me out!
Cool one, Jeff. I didn't even know that one of those existed.

[quote name="bcbgcbrcb" post=1493752]Cool one, Jeff. I didn't even know that one of those existed.[/QUOTE]

There might be only one in existence!

[quote name="jb217676" post=1493756]There might be only one in existence![/QUOTE]

The owner is on Net54...he ain't gonna let it go.  Trust me, I tried!

[quote name="h2oya311" post=1493949]The owner is on Net54...he ain't gonna let it go.  Trust me, I tried![/QUOTE]

Who is this member, identify yourself! That postcard belongs in Toronto!

[quote name="jb217676" post=1493969]Who is this member, identify yourself! That postcard belongs in Toronto![/QUOTE]

it belongs in my collection (down in sunny AZ), if I might interject.  Kudos to you if you are able to persuade our Net54 community friend to part ways with it...you never know!  Maybe he, too, is buying a house and needs to raise funds!

[IMG]https://farm1.staticflickr.com/43/90038690_d98f7571ba_o_d.jpg[/IMG]
I suppose if you really want a postcard, I could trim this down to 4. X 6
